vaccine.name: Varicella Zoaster
vaccine.schedule: This vaccine is given once in a lifetime to individuals whom have not been exposed before

vaccine.name: Meningococcal
vaccine.schedule: This vaccine is given annually to individuals who live in regions that are prone to getting this condition

vaccine.name: Chicken Pox
vaccine.schedule: This vaccine is given to individuals who live in areas that are infested to prevent spread

vaccine.name: Haemophilus Influenza type b
vaccine.schedule: This is given annually to prevent spread of the condition to individuals who are prone

vaccine.name: Hepatitis  A
vaccine.schedule: This vaccine is given to food handlers and healthcare workers to prevent further spread

vaccine.name: MMR
vaccine.schedule: This is a vaccine given to individuals who living in areas that are infested and also given to pregnant women
